message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the chance to purchase this product. Given its value, I'm asking for $20,000.  I'm confident it will exceed your expectations.
Hi Alice, I appreciate the offer, but $20,000 is a bit more than I'm comfortable with.  I'm willing to pay $17,000 for the product.  Let's see if we can find common ground.

Hi Bob, thanks for the offer. I understand your position, but I'm aiming for a price closer to $19,000. I'm confident this product will bring you a lot of value, would you consider meeting me halfway?

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $19,000 is still a bit too high for me.  I'm firm on my previous offer of $17,000.  If you're not able to come down to that, I'll have to consider other options.
